text: Vera Mantero (born 1966) is a Portuguese dancer and choreographer. After performing for five years with the Gulbenkian Ballet, she turned to choreography in 1987 and has since performed widely in Europe and North and South America. A major figure in new Portuguese dance, she frequently improvises with Mark Tompkins, Meg Stuart and Steve Paxton. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lisbon Category:Portuguese ballet dancers Category:Portuguese female dancers Category:Portuguese choreographers
title: Vera Mantero
